alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 12:34PM MST until January 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM MST /8 PM PST/ THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches possible. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, and Lolo Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 9 PM MST /8 PM PST/ this evening to 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Wednesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday afternoon through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Clearwater Mountains; Southern Clearwater Mountains
